name: marwanalsoltany/amqp-agent
description: An elegant wrapper around the famous php-amqplib for 90% use case.

suggest.symfony/console: Symfony console component allows you to create CLI commands. Your console commands can be used for any recurring task, such as cronjobs, imports, or other batch jobs.
suggest.monolog/monolog: Monolog sends your logs to files, sockets, inboxes, databases and various web services.

scripts.build: composer run sniff && composer run detect && composer run test && composer run measure && composer run document
scripts.build-global: composer run sniff-global && composer run detect-global && composer run test-global && composer run measure-global && composer run document-global
scripts.build-dev: composer run-script --dev --verbose build && echo "Development build completed!"
scripts.build-dev-global: composer run-script --dev --verbose build-global && echo "Development build completed! [GLOBAL]"
scripts.build-prod: composer run-script --quiet build && echo "Production build completed!"
scripts.build-prod-global: composer run-script --quiet build-global && echo "Production build completed! [GLOBAL]"
